DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacogenetics allow clinician identify association individual 's genetic profile his/her response drug . The A118G ( c.188A > G ) single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) mu-opioid receptor ( OPRM1 ) . The mutated protein , N40D , appear increase bind affinity potency beta-endorphin approximately 3-fold . Individuals carry variant receptor gene ( A118G ) may show difference function mediate beta-endorphin action alter OPRM1 . Combined spinal-epidural ( CSE ) analgesia commonly utilized technique labor analgesia . Analgesia initiate intrathecal administration lipid-soluble opioid ( e.g . fentanyl ) , sometimes combined local anesthetic . The mean ( ± SD ) duration analgesia intrathecal fentanyl 25 microgram 89 ± 43 min . The ED50 intrathecal fentanyl labor analgesia vary 14 microgram 18.2 microgram . The wide variability duration analgesia , well difference ED50 may result difference know affect labor pain ( e.g. , ethnicity , parity , stage labor ) . Another possible explanation difference opioid requirement duration , well incidence side effect itch nausea/vomiting , opioid responsiveness determine genetic variability µ-opioid receptor . The ED50 intrathecal fentanyl labor analgesia significantly low parturients carry A118G variant mu-opioid receptor , compare parturients A118 wild type receptor . The purpose study determine whether polymorphism nucleotide 118 OPRM1 influence duration intrathecal opioid ( fentanyl ) labor analgesia , intrathecal opioid ( morphine ) postoperative analgesia .
DOC.brief_title: Mu-Opioid Receptor Genetic Polymorphism Intrathecal Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Study 1 ( intrathecal fentanyl ) : The primary outcome variable duration intrathecal fentanyl analgesia . A two-sided log rank test overall sample size 152 subject ( wild type OPRM1 = 106 , variant OPRM1 = 46 ) achieve 80 % power α = 0.05 detect difference 0.2 0.5 0.3 ( proportion subject continue intrathecal fentanyl analgesia 70 min ) . This assume 70 % subject wild-type MUOR1 phenotype , 30 % variant phenotype . To account anticipated subject dropout , 175 subject enrol study . Study 2 ( intrathecal morphine ) : The primary outcome variable amount rescue analgesia ( morphine equivalent ) necessary 24 h intrathecal morphine injection . An overall sample size 71 subject ( wild type OPRM1 = 50 , variant OPRM1 = 21 ) achieve 81 % power detect difference 15 mg morphine equivalent null hypothesis group mean 40 mg morphine equivalent alternative hypothesis mean one group 25 mg morphine equivalent . The estimate group standard deviation 20 mg morphine equivalent alpha = 0.05 use two-side Mann-Whitney test assume actual distribution uniform . This assume 70 % subject wild-type OPRM1 phenotype , 30 % variant phenotype . To account anticipated subject dropout , 90 subject enrol study . Protocol specific method : Study 1 : Eligible parturients admit Labor Delivery Unit Prentice Women 's Hospital approach study participation immediately routine preanesthetic evaluation . This occur shortly admission Labor Delivery Unit . Women agree participate give write , inform consent time . Venous blood obtain genetic analysis 118 position µ-opioid receptor gene shortly subject consent study participation , either intravenous catheter place routine intravenous access labor delivery , fresh venipuncture . A total 10 mL blood collect two 5 mL EDTA tube . The tube batch , cod store 40C refrigerator send ( 1x/month ) laboratory Dr. J. L. Blouin , care Dr. Landau , Hopitaux Universitaires de Geneve . Genetic analysis perform describe . When subject first request analgesia , cervix examine ( routine procedure prior initiate analgesia ) . If cervix dilate 2 5 cm , parturient include study . Visual analogue score ( VAS ) pain ( 100 mm line 0 mm = pain 100 mm = worst possible pain ) determine immediately initiation analgesia . Combined spinal-epidural analgesia initiate sit position per routine intrathecal fentanyl 25 microgram . An epidural catheter sit . No drug inject epidural catheter parturient request analgesia . The parturient place lateral position epidural catheter secure . A VAS determine 10 min intrathecal injection . The primary outcome variable duration intrathecal fentanyl analgesia.At time parturient request additional analgesia , cervix examine . A VAS determine . In addition , parturient ask presence pruritus since initiation analgesia ( none , mild , moderate , severe ) , nausea ( none , mild , moderate severe ) , vomit ( yes , ) . An epidural test dose administer ( lidocaine 1.5 % epinephrine 1:200,000 ) . Assuming negative test dose , bupivacaine 0.125 % inject incrementally T10 sensory level . Epidural analgesia maintain patient control epidural analgesia ( PCEA ) ( bupivacaine 0.0625 % fentanyl 1.95 micro grams/mL : background infusion 15 mL/h , PCEA bolus 5 mL , lockout 10 min , maximum 30 mL/h ) per routine . The study end parturient delivers epidural infusion discontinue . At time subject ask satisfaction labor analgesia ( 100 mm scale , 0 mm = satisfy , 100 mm = satisfy ) . The following data collect : maternal age , height , weight , race ( self-described ) , cervical dilation initiation analgesia , time cervical dilation 2nd request analgesia , maximum oxytocin dose , time complete cervical dilation ( 10 cm ) , time delivery , mode delivery , neonatal weight , Apgar score umbilical blood gas value ( obtain part routine care ) , total dose epidural bupivacaine local anesthetic , total dose epidural fentanyl , number PCEA boluses number manual bolus ( anesthesiologist ) . Cases exclude data analysis CSE analgesia perform , analgesia ( VAS > 10 mm ) 10 minute intrathecal injection ( failure CSE technique ) , cervical dilation 8 cm within 60 minute intrathecal injection , patient cesarean delivery . Genetic analysis perform described Routine aspiration prophylaxis administer ( intravenous ranitidine metoclopramide , oral antacid ) . Spinal anesthesia initiate sit position routine manner bupivacaine 12 mg ( 1.6 mL 0.75 % hyperbaric bupivacaine ) , fentanyl 15 µg , morphine 150 microgram . Subjects place supine leave uterine displacement position immediately intrathecal injection . The level cephalad sensory blockade determine 30 min intrathecal injection use von Frye hair . Subjects sensory level T6 , require intraoperative systemic opioid supplementation , exclude study participation . In PACU 24 hour surgery , patient receive ibuprofen 600 mg po q6h per standard protocol . Patients may request rescue analgesia experience discomfort . Rescue medication consist hydrocodone 10 mg plus acetaminophen 325 mg per o . An additional dose hydrocodone 10 mg plus acetaminophen 325 mg provide 1 hour pain relieve . These routine oral analgesic medication postoperative Cesarean delivery analgesia . Standard order write monitoring sedation respiratory rate , treatment side effect ( nausea , vomit , pruritus respiratory depression ) . The study end 24 h intrathecal injection . At time subject ask satisfaction postoperative analgesia ( 100 mm scale , 0 mm = satisfy , 100 mm = satisfy ) . Further analgesia dictate study protocol . The following data collect : maternal age , height , weight , race ( self-described ) , requirement supplemental intraoperative sedation , neonatal weight , intra- postoperative treatment pruritus , nausea vomit . In addition time first request supplemental oral analgesia , follow record : supplement analgesia dose requirement ( number acetaminophen/hydrocodone tablet ) 4 , 8 , 12 , 18 , 24 h intrathecal injection . DNA collection : Peripheral blood collect 2 5ml EDTA tube ( total 10ml ) . DNA prepare non-phenolic method use Puregene Blood Extraction Kit ( Gentra , Minneapolis , MN ) test molecular weight gel electrophoresis purity quality optical densitometry measure ( ratio 260/280 nm ) . SNP genotyping : For identification allelic distribution A118G SNP , 20-60 ng DNA individual first amplify PCR ( thermocycler apparatuses equip 96 well-microtiter plate block ) use primer design vicinity SNPs . The SNP genotyped amplified product minisequencing ( Pyrosequencing ) . Pyrosequencing : PCR use cDNA specific primer ( span intron genomic DNA ) , forward primer label 5 ' biotin perform standard condition , product analyze Pyrosequencing method . Briefly , internal primer design two nucleotide mutation site , two mRNA population could assay quantify relative amount allele present PCR product . DNA normal affected subject use control . PCR product immobilize Dynabeads ( Dynal , Oslo , Norway ) 15 min , 65 oC incubation buffer contain 10mM Tris-HCl , 2M NaCl , 1mM EDTA 0.1 % Tween 20 . PCR product remove solution use magnetic separation , denature NaOH 0.5 M wash 200mM Tris-Acetate , 50mM MgAc2 . The remain single strand DNA hybridize internal 'sequencing ' primer , heat mix 80oC , slowly cool room temperature . Next enzyme substrate mix automatically add well , reaction proceed 28oC , sequential addition single nucleotide predetermine order . Luciferase peak height proportional number nucleotide incorporation , show quantitative ( 5 % error rate ) number experimental setting . Coded DNA sample store Dr. Blouin 's laboratory . No sequence do unless subject sign consent form future study .
DOC.criteria: Study 1 : Laboring Women Nulliparous woman spontaneous labor spontaneous rupture membrane Term pregnancy ( ≥ 37 week gestation ) Vertex presentation Healthy , ASA PS 12 Desire neuraxial labor analgesia . Study 2 : Cesarean Delivery Nulliparous woman undergo elective primary Cesarean delivery ( e.g. , breech presentation , macrosomia ) Term pregnancy ( ≥ 37 week gestation ) Healthy , ASA PS 12 Desired spinal anesthesia . Study 1 : Laboring Women Chronic pregnancy induce disease Chronic opioid use History substance abuse Systemic opioid analgesia initiation neuraxial labor analgesia Cervical dilation < 2 cm > 5 cm time request neuraxial analgesia Allergy fentanyl Study 2 : Cesarean delivery Chronic pregnancy induce disease Chronic opioid use Previous abdominal pelvic surgery Allergy fentanyl , morphine , bupivacaine BMI ≥ 40 kg/m2 History substance abuse Failed spinal anesthesia Requirement systemic opioid supplementation Cesarean delivery .
